data.description: Transform PGN(chess games) to various forms
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The point of PGN is to act as a computer form readable by humans.
    That said, what is easy to parse, is not necessarily easy to read or
    easy to use. This module will transform PGN in, to various text out.
    PDF, LaTeX, HTML, XML and others come to mind and will be added as
    developed.
